properties.name: relayer.smtp.auth.type
properties.description: NTML for NTLM authentication; USERPASS for the rest

properties.name: relayer.smtp.auth.username
properties.description: Username for the authentication in the relaying server. Must be a full email address if 'relayer.smtp.from.override' is set to true

properties.name: relayer.smtp.auth.password
properties.description: Password for the authentication in the relaying server.

properties.name: relayer.smtp.from.override
properties.description: If true, 'from' address will be replaced by the relayer.smtp.auth.username property. This means this property must be a full email address

properties.name: relayer.smtp.server.port
properties.description: Listening port for the smtp server                                                                                                           |
